name: 武汉
details: 读书，顺便在附近旅旅游，城市内部有这么大一个湖还是舒服的
detailsEn: Studied, toured around, the city has a big lake in the middle, it's comfortable

name: 西安
details: 在一个充满历史气息的城市里度过本科的四年，确实是一个很像家的城市
detailsEn: Spending four years of undergraduate studies in a city steeped in history, it truly is a city that feels like home.

name: 三亚
details: 一次在三岁的旅行，如果不是有照片我真不知道我来过
detailsEn: A trip at the age of three, if it weren't for the photos I wouldn't know I came here.

name: 哈尔滨
details: CNCC2025，顺便在附近转了转，太阳岛确实值得一去，江边的风景和岛上的小镇都很有特色，索菲亚教堂很出片
detailsEn: Attended CNCC2025 and explored the area. Sun Island is definitely worth a visit; the riverside scenery and the island town are quite unique.

name: 荆州
details: 很匆忙的行程，荆州的博物馆和古塔值得一去， 鱼糕也好吃
detailsEn: A rushed trip, but the Jingzhou Museum and the ancient pagoda are worth visiting, and the Yugao is delicious too.

name: 杭州
details: 跑来面试了一圈顺便旅游，西湖和东湖有点接近，虽然都说杭州无美食，但杭州酒家值得一去
detailsEn: Came for an interview and did some sightseeing. West Lake feels similar to East Lake. Although people say Hangzhou lacks good food, Hangzhou Restaurant is definitely worth a visit.

name: 北京
details: 经典打卡旅游，故宫，长城，天安门；剩下全是出差，北京烤鸭和涮肉还是好吃的
detailsEn: Classic sightseeing trip, visited Forbidden City, Great Wall, Tiananmen Square; the rest were all business trips. Beijing Roast Duck and Hot Pot are still delicious.

name: 日照
details: 小时候就喜欢去海边玩
detailsEn: I loved going to the beach as a child.

name: 晋城
details: 也没什么特别好玩的，王莽岭和郭亮村还不错
detailsEn: Nothing particularly special, but Wangmangling and Guoliang Village are quite nice.

name: 敦煌
details: 莫高窟千年的历史令人震撼，鸣沙山月牙泉的沙漠风光也很独特
detailsEn: The thousand-year history of the Mogao Caves is awe-inspiring, and the desert scenery of Mingsha Mountain and Crescent Lake is also very unique.

name: 嘉峪关
details: 天下第一雄关名不虚传
detailsEn: The First Pass Under Heaven lives up to its reputation.

name: 西宁
details: 青海湖的碧波万顷和油菜花田美不胜收，茶卡盐湖“天空之镜”的倒影更是如梦如幻
detailsEn: The vast blue waves of Qinghai Lake and the fields of rapeseed flowers are breathtaking, while the 'Mirror of the Sky' reflection at Chaka Salt Lake is truly dreamlike.

name: 安顺
details: 黄果树瀑布非常壮观，水势浩大，穿过水帘洞的体验也很有趣
detailsEn: The Huangguoshu Waterfall is incredibly spectacular with massive water flow, and the experience of walking through the Water Curtain Cave is quite interesting.

name: 贵阳
details: 最大的感觉是酸汤鱼不好吃
detailsEn: My biggest impression was that the Sour Soup Fish wasn't very good.

name: 黔东南
details: 千户苗寨从山顶向下看的景色确实很美
detailsEn: The view looking down from the top of the mountain at the Thousand Households Miao Village is truly beautiful.

name: 厦门
details: 在鼓浪屿岸边发呆的感觉还不错
detailsEn: Spacing out by the shore of Gulangyu Island felt pretty good.

name: 丽江
details: 在拉市海体验湿地骑马，丽江古城感受纳西族的小桥流水，玉龙雪山的冰川公园和蓝月谷更是绝美
detailsEn: Experienced horseback riding in the Lashihai wetlands, felt the Naxi culture with bridges and flowing water in Lijiang Old Town; the Glacier Park and Blue Moon Valley of Yulong Snow Mountain are absolutely stunning.

name: 昆明
details: 石林典型的喀斯特地貌千奇百怪，过桥米线汤鲜味美，不愧是春城
detailsEn: The typical Karst landform of the Stone Forest is full of strange wonders, and the Cross-Bridge Rice Noodles are delicious with fresh soup; it truly lives up to the name 'City of Spring'.

name: 张掖
details: 七彩丹霞名不虚传，层理交错的岩石像上帝打翻的调色盘，日落且雨后观感最佳
detailsEn: The Rainbow Danxia lives up to its reputation; the layered rocks look like a palette overturned by God, best viewed at sunset or after rain.

name: 宝鸡
details: 秦岭主峰太白山，拥有独特的高山海子和第四纪冰川遗迹，鳌太线最近热度好像很高
detailsEn: Taibai Mountain, the main peak of the Qinling Mountains, boasts unique alpine lakes and remnants of Quaternary glaciers; the Aota Line seems to be very popular recently.

name: 乐山
details: 山是一尊佛，佛是一座山，三江汇流处的乐山大佛气势恢宏，令人肃然起敬
detailsEn: The mountain is a Buddha, and the Buddha is a mountain. The Leshan Giant Buddha at the confluence of three rivers is magnificent and awe-inspiring.

name: 都江堰
details: 两千年前的无坝引水工程奇迹，造就了成都平原的“天府之国”，鱼嘴和宝瓶口智慧无穷
detailsEn: A miracle of damless irrigation engineering from two thousand years ago, creating the 'Land of Abundance' in the Chengdu Plain; the Fish Mouth and Bottle-Neck Channel show infinite wisdom.

name: 洛阳
details: 一个很小的城市，但是很舒服，在这里度过了人生的前18年
detailsEn: A small city, but very comfortable, spent the first 18 years of my life here.

name: 成都
details: 好吃的城市
detailsEn: A delicious city.

name: 宜昌
details: 三峡还是很壮观，不过游船没什么意思
detailsEn: The Three Gorges are still very spectacular, but the cruise wasn't very interesting.

name: 神农架
details: 神秘的地方
detailsEn: A mysterious place.
